singlecellmodeling.description: Use the BluePyOpt to re-run an optimization with your choices for the parameters range

files.entryname: Rebuild Single HippoCell - NSG Job Manager

singlecellmodeling.title: Build your own single hippocampal cell model using HBP data
singlecellmodeling.description: Use the BluePyOpt to run an optimization choosing from HBP data for morphology, channel kinetics, features, and parameters.

files.entryname: BuildOwn Single HippoCell - NSG Job Manager

singlecellmodeling.title: Optimize a cerebellar granule cell model composed by a single section
singlecellmodeling.description: Using BluePyOpt to optimize a single compartmental cerebellar granule cell. All the parameters, channels and morphology can be modified. This version runs directly on the collaboratory and it is limited to small optimizations

singlecellmodeling.title: Optimize a cerebellar granule cell multicompartmental model
singlecellmodeling.description: Using BluePyOpt to optimize a multcompartmental cerebellar granule cell composed by four dendrites, soma and a custom multi segmented axon. All the parameters, channels and morphology can be modified. This version runs directly on the collaboratory and it is limited to small optimizations

singlecellmodeling.title: Simulation and validation of a mouse Purkinje cell multicompartmental model
singlecellmodeling.description: Simulation and validation of a mouse Purkinje cell multicompartmental model obtained from BluePyOpt optimizer. The purpose of this usecase it to extract, simulate and validated a series of physiologically correct Purkinje cells. This notebook runs directly on the Collab and does not require HPC resources

singlecellmodeling.title: Optimize a striatal fast-spiking interneuron
singlecellmodeling.description: Fit parameters of a striatal fast-spiking interneuron model to the experimental data. Optimization uses BluePyOpt as well as the realistic morphology, channel kinetics and extracted neurophysiological features. This version runs directly on the collaboratory and it is limited to small optimizations.

singlecellmodeling.title: Build your own single hippocampal cell model using HBP and your own data
singlecellmodeling.description: Use the BluePyOpt to run an optimization choosing/uploading morphology, channel kinetics, features, and parameters.

experts.name: Experts
experts.tooltip: Use case for contributors and tools experts

beta.name: Beta
beta.tooltip: A service of this maturity level has reached a certain robustness and may be used by early adopters.

experimental.name: Experimental
experimental.tooltip: A service of this maturity level is under heavy development and recommended only for specialists’ use or use for co-design partners.

byor.name: BYOR
byor.tooltip: (Bring Your Own Resources) Services of this type allow you to delegate the execution to resources provided by the user. This is subject to technical compatibility.
